attributes.action: Think again of Downing Street secretly studying plans to charge householders a Bin Tax on their rubbish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposed ( THE SUN Feb 10th 2007)  monthly £10 tax will be another burden to the British tax payer and also put extra burden onto the poorer households of this country, it will also lead to more fly tipping etc,When are all these extra taxes going to cease that are being placed upon every working man and woman of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
